text:
Hey,
anyone has an idea what and why HubSpot adds this script to headers on all blogs? What's that for?
I tried to find source, ask ppl if they added something, but no one could answer me :disappointed:
I checked everywhere and I didn't add it - nor template, nor headers in settings etc.
```<script src="//platform.linkedin.com/in.js" type="text/javascript">
    lang: en_US
</script>```

What do u mean? I mean where can i find it on HS?
Do u mean connected apps/marketplace?
idk, the only thing i know it’s that link is linked in sdk
I believe that script is for LinkedIn social sharing. If you turn off LinkedIn in social sharing under blog settings it will be removed from the site.

F me. That's it. Social sharing.
And ofc probably there is no way to defer it? Right, HS? :slightly_smiling_face:
i really have no information about that sorry

Hello Everyone!  We have a little problem that could be solved with a javascript enabled page refresh, but I'm hoping someone has a more HubSpot way of doing this.   The Scenario is we have a landing page that takes in an integer value.  On submit the integer is used in a few calculated field.  OUR PROBLEM.  The thank you page should be displaying these calculated fields.  BUT the values of the calculated fields are still NULL.  We can give the page a refresh and the values show up appropriately.

Is there a way to delay the thank you page's load until the contact's calculated fields have been saved?

<https://offers.ipassinstitute.com/malpractice>
